gameModel.gameObjects

Class NonPlayerCharacter

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameModel.gameObjects.MortalObject
      • gameModel.gameObjects.NonPlayerCharacter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameObject, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Slime

    public abstract class NonPlayerCharacter
extends MortalObject
    Represents a NPC in the game. Currently no implementation for friendly NPCs, so all concrete implementations of this class are expected to be enemies in the game. The NPC will attack surrounding targets if it is aggresive. A non-aggresive NPC should become aggresive if attacked.
    Author:
    Jiaheng Wang (wangjiah)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
